# env0_environments (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `include_archived_environments` (Boolean) set to 'true' to include archived environments (defaults to 'false')
- `organization_id` (String) organization id to list all environments in the organization
- `project_id` (String) project id to filter environments by

### Read-Only

- `environments` (List of Object) A list of environments (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--environments))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--environments"></a>
### Nested Schema for `environments`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `project_id` (String)
